alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 10 at 4:00PM EST until December 10 at 4:30PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EST FOR PORTIONS OF BRYAN...EFFINGHAM...CHATHAM...BEAUFORT AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 359 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Skidaway Island, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Bryan, Effingham, Chatham, Beaufort and Jasper Counties, including the following locations... Talmadge Memorial Bridge, Hamer, Oglethorpe Mall, Union Junction, Armstrong Atlantic State University, Grubbs, Cresthill, Edgemere, Silk Hope, and Sweet Hill. This warning includes the following interstates: I-16 between mile markers 154 and 168. I-516 between mile markers 3 and 9. I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 2 and 14. I-95 in Georgia between mile markers 92 and 112. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
